The capital city is also named Bubanza. ==Communes== It is divided administratively into 5 communes: * Commune of Bubanza (Bubanza) * Commune of Gihanga (Gihanga) * Commune of Musigati (Musigati) * Commune of Mpanda (Mpanda) * Commune of Rugazi (Rugazi) ==References== Category:Provinces of Burundi
